text_block_list.text:
Falcon? She isn't here. She left about<n>one hour and
thirty-five minutes ago.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A day has passed since I<n>recommended that Smart Falcon
run<n>on dirt courses. Wanting to talk to her<n>again, I've
come to her dorm in<n>search of her.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
My apologies for the late introduction.<n>I'm Eishin Flash,
Smart Falcon's<n>roommate.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Are you... Falcon's trainer? If it's<n>urgent, contacting her
smartphone is<n>the surest way to get a hold of her.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Although I can't guarantee that she'll<n>check her phone. She
might've turned<n>it off by now.
choice_data_list: Do you know where she went?
Do you know where she went?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Well...

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka was amazing! I knew<n>she was good, but I
didn't think she'd<n>win by that much!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
I'm so glad we caught the whole<n>thing in person! I can't
wait to see<n>Suzuka take center stage for the<n>winning
concert!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My search for Smart Falcon leads me<n>to the racetrack. The
stadium's filled<n>to the brim with excited onlookers<n>waiting
for the winning concert to<n>begin.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! This is so exciting! ☆ Go,<n>Suzuka! You can do it! I
believe in you!

text_block_list.name: Wild Crowd
text_block_list.text: YEAHHH! SUZUKAAA!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The concert begins. Everyone's eyes<n>are glued to the
incredible<n>performance that follows.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though Silence Suzuka's voice isn't<n>the loudest, the joy in
it is palpable—a<n>joy shared by all her cheering fans.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh! Sniffle... Suzukaaa!You're the best! Watching you runmakes me feel like I can do anything!I'll keep working hard, just like youdo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For a moment, I find myself<n>captivated like everyone else.
Then<n>my eyes drift over to Smart Falcon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her eyes are also locked onto the<n>stage, but something
about her gaze<n>seems... different.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After the concert ends, I look for<n>Smart Falcon, but she's
already gone.<n>It's possible that she left for the<n>dorm, but I
suspect otherwise.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hi, everybody! I'm Falco! That was a<n>great concert, wasn't
it? ☆ Suzuka<n>never fails to impress!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But don't go anywhere yet! I'll give<n>you a fantastic
performance too! All I<n>ask is that you remember my name! ☆<n>
With that said, let's get started! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My suspicions are confirmed when I<n>spot Smart Falcon
performing by the<n>riverside. Maybe this is just a plan to<n>
attract an audience still riding their<n>concert high, but...

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text: Hey, she looks like an Umamusume<n>too. Do you know her?

text_block_list.name: Passerby B
text_block_list.text:
Nah, never seen her. Maybe she<n>hasn't made her debut
yet? Anyway,<n>wasn't Suzuka's concert great? My<n>
favorite part was when she—

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... How was that,everybody?! It's my dream to oneday perform on a major stage! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: One day...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I... wonder when that'll be...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's not like anybody here would<n>know. Time to
head—oh.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I... I've always loved idols a lot, ever<n>since I was little.
They're so cute, and<n>they smile so bright that they light up<n>
any stage.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I kept telling myself that I'd be an idol<n>one day too. But that
dream changed<n>just a little when I saw my first race.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I went because I'd heard that<n>Umamusume sing and dance
just like<n>idols do, in addition to race. It was<n>such a strange
concept to me that I<n>had to find out more.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Seeing everybody running their<n>hardest, I couldn't take my
eyes off<n>the racetrack—not even for a second!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But what was even more exciting<n>was the concert that
came after!<n>When the spotlight hit them, everyone<n>shone
twice as bright as they did on<n>the racetrack!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I thought to myself, "That's what I<n>want!" Umamusume
shine their<n>brightest while running, and their<n>winning
concerts are the cherry on<n>top!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That's when I decided to become an<n>Umadol! I wanted to
light up the world<n>like they did—no, even more than that!<n>I
wanted to become a shining beacon<n>of hope!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Just like... the way Suzuka did today,<n>taking first place and
performing<n>center stage...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I want to be a shining star just like<n>her! I want to be an
Umadol that<n>moves the hearts of all who watch<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
If I keep working hard, one day my<n>dream'll come true. Or at
least, that's<n>what I keep telling myself...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I don't mean to say that I feel like<n>giving up! Let me
make it clear—I still<n>dream of becoming a world-class<n>
Umadol!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
It's just that... that dream feels so<n>distant today. Suzuka
was so<n>amazing, it's hard to think I could<n>follow in her
footsteps... Haha... ha...
choice_data_list:
You have a shot at winning if you run in dirt
races.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I know... I actually knew as<n>much from the start.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I was admitted here, my<n>teachers have all
suggested that I run<n>on dirt courses. They say it suits me<n>
better.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But... I can't become a top Umadol<n>running in dirt races. You
know what I<n>mean, right?
choice_data_list: Because they aren't as popular as turf races...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh. If I choose to run in dirt races,<n>I'll never perform on
a big stage like<n>Suzuka did today.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
The fans like turf races because<n>that's where all the
superstars are.<n>It's only fair that the runners who win<n>
there are considered the best.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I could run on dirt courses, win<n>races, and be the star
of those<n>winning concerts.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But... that's not what I want! I don'twant to be the lead of just anyconcert! My dream is to become a top Umadol and make it big on thegreatest stages!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I don't want to give up on my dreams<n>just 'cause I'm
"better suited" for<n>something else! There's no room for<n>
compromise! I can't do it! I won't do<n>it!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You probably think I'm being<n>ridiculous. But I don't care! I'll
keep<n>racing on turf courses in hopes of one<n>day achieving
my dream!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I understand her reason for wanting<n>to run in turf races. I
also agree that<n>it's important to dream big, but...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She seems to think that dirt racing is<n>some kind of
second-rate category,<n>and that's just not right. In order to<n>
help her realize that...
choice_data_list:
Would your teachers be okay with you missing
class tomorrow?

Would your teachers be okay with you missing
class tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Oh, uh... As long as you're the<n>one asking for
permission, they'd<n>probably be okay with it, but... why?
choice_data_list: I want to take you to a race.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Okay. I still don't get why, but I'll do<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But in exchange, you have to do one<n>thing for me!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Well, you see...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I'd like it if you called me Falco, not<n>Falcon! ☆ It sounds
cuter that way!
